meanings.sent1: The colorfastnesses of the fabric ensured it did not fade in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The colorfastnesses of the dye were tested by washing it multiple times.
meanings.sent3: The colorfastnesses of the paint made the artist confident it would last for years.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to maintaining the colorfastnesses of her clothes was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The colorfastnesses of the flowers in the garden brightened up the entire yard.

meanings.definition: The ability of a material to retain its color when exposed to various conditions.
meanings.sent1: The colorfastnesses of the carpet were impressive, even after years of foot traffic.
meanings.sent2: The colorfastnesses of the curtains were evident as they remained vibrant despite sunlight exposure.
meanings.sent3: The colorfastnesses of the marker surprised the students when it didn't smudge on the paper.
meanings.sent4: The colorfastnesses of the flag symbolized the enduring spirit of the nation.
meanings.sent5: The colorfastnesses of the painting made it a valuable piece of art for generations to come.
